description:
Ishizuka is a Sihorn racer who wore the number 5 in a race at the Smillville track. He was seen racing twice, once when Ash and his friends first arrived and then in the race that Ash participated in.
During the race with Ash, Ishizuka was attacked and captured by Team Rocket so they could steal the racers Rihorn`s. He was later let go by Ash and his friends.
name: Ishizuka
